mapper.select: SELECT cart.ctid,cart.gdcount,goodssize.gstext,goods.gdname,img.gimgurl,price.price FROM cart JOIN goodsinfo goods ON cart.gdid=goods.gdid JOIN goodsimage img ON goods.gdid=img.gdid JOIN goodsprice price ON goods.gdid=price.gdid JOIN USER ON cart.userid=user.userid JOIN goodssize ON goodssize.gsid=cart.gsid WHERE user.userid=#{userid} AND img.gimgtype=1 AND price.utid=user.utid;
